description.oldValue:
Active speaker is a new view added to Microsoft Teams meetings. It highlights the active speaker while still showing the rest of the participants in the meeting. Users can use this new view through the view switcher in a meeting.
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue:
Active speaker is a new view added to Microsoft
Teams meetings. It highlights the active speaker while still showing the rest
of the participants in the meeting. Users can use this new view through the
view switcher in a meeting.
